name: ACH_GatEB_Destructive Mania
description: Destroy all broken walls in Glum Cove:6N2E

name: ACH_GatEB_First Blood
description: Kill the roach in Outer Walls:1S3E

name: ACH_GatEB_Orb Preservationist
description: Strike only six orbs in Outer Walls:2S2E

name: ACH_GatEB_A Steady Hand
description: Don't turn your sword in The Rasarun Court:1E

name: ACH_GatEB_You're Not Alone
description: Have at least one soldier survive in The True Court:1N

name: ACH_GatEB_I'm Not Left-Handed
description: Don't turn your sword in Bractea Town:1E

name: ACH_GatEB_Timed to Perfection
description: Don't let the queen lay eggs in The Roach Pits:3N

name: ACH_GatEB_Backswipery
description: Don't turn your sword after stepping on the pressure plate in Drokkendutt's Fortress:1N1E

name: ACH_GatEB_Out in the Open
description: Don't take a tunnel in Drokkendutt's Fortress:1N2E

name: ACH_GatEB_Look, No Hands!
description: Don't use your sword in Smuggler's Maze:2N1W

name: ACH_GatEB_Lone Soldier
description: Don't have any soldiers cross the yellow door in Smuggler's Maze:4N1W

name: ACH_GatEB_Sword-Only Slaughter
description: Don't use the bombs in Tuenan Armory:1N2E

name: ACH_GatEB_Two to Tango
description: Use only one horn in Inauro Canyon:2N

name: ACH_GatEB_Monty Hallway Problem
description: Don't enter from the northern entrance in Inauro Canyon:2N1W

name: ACH_GatEB_Impressing the Ladies
description: Don't use any horns in Inauro Canyon:1N1E

name: ACH_GatEB_House Upon the Sand
description: Kill the northern roach before killing all three golems in Golem Encampment:2N

name: ACH_GatEB_Queen Charmer
description: Don't drop any trapdoors in Daskeros Tower:1N1E

name: ACH_GatEB_Straight to the Point
description: Kill all roaches without dropping any trapdoors in Daskeros Tower:2N

name: ACH_GatEB_Charge First, Think Later
description: Clear Daskeros Tower:4N with the blue doors up

name: ACH_GatEB_Single-Handed Clean-Up
description: Don't turn your sword in Englos Keep:1S

name: ACH_GatEB_Master Swordsman I
description: Don't use the horn or the bomb in Englos Keep:1S1W

name: ACH_GatEB_Master Swordsman II
description: Don't use the horn in Englos Keep:1S1E

name: ACH_GatEB_Stuck in the Mire
description: Don't turn your sword or step on the entrance tile again in Wraithwing Swamp:2N1E

name: ACH_GatEB_Time for Elevenses
description: Clear and exit Akandian Tunnels:1N1W, dropping at most 11 trapdoors

name: ACH_GatEB_Red Means Danger
description: Don't step on a red (dirt floor) tile in Inner Chambers:1N

name: ACH_GatEB_Going It Alone
description: Step in the middle before killing any roaches or queens in Inner Chambers:3N2E

name: ACH_GatEB_Peaceful Resolution
description: Don't kill the Tuenan Captain

name: ACH_GatEB_Take Five
description: PoW:1N - When Gunthro steps on the last door, all five doors must be open

name: ACH_GatEB_Not Invited to the Party
description: PoW:1N1E - Don't use your sword

name: ACH_GatEB_Surrounded by Incompetents
description: PoW:1N1E - Step on the pressure plate yourself, and don't use the bombs

name: ACH_GatEB_Explorer Extraordinaire
description: Enter the Spider Cave

name: ACH_GatEB_WIN
description: GatEB: Saw the ending and credits

name: ACH_GatEB_MASTERED
description: Completed GatEB and cleared all secret rooms

name: ACH_GatEB_On His Majesty's Service
description: Sent on a mission by the Rasarun Court

name: ACH_GatEB_Ragtag Bunch of Misfits
description: Assemble the Rasarun Leaders

name: ACH_GatEB_Without Further Delay
description: Ready to attack the enemy fortress

name: ACH_GatEB_The Heart of the Mystery
description: Enter the Sand Temple

name: ACH_KDD20_But You Can't Hide
description: (KDD) L1:6N2W - Don't hide in the alcove

name: ACH_KDD20_All Together, Now...
description: (KDD) L1:6N1W - Kill the roaches in nine consecutive turns

name: ACH_KDD20_Who Let the Roaches Out?

description: (KDD) L1:3N2W - Kill the roach facing East and clear the room

name: ACH_KDD20_Cornered in the Centre

description: (KDD) L2:2S3E - Allow only one roach to spawn when clearing the room

name: ACH_KDD20_They're Behind You!

description: (KDD) L3:3N1E - Kill everything but the queen facing West, and kill the queen last

description: (KDD) L3:2N1E - Kill the roaches in three consecutive turns

name: ACH_KDD20_What's the Time, Mr Roach?
